documents.document: Just found out @clubpenguin is shutting down. V emotional rn
Stepdad, looking out window: one of my bloody tomatoes has fallen off... f*ck this wind #tomatoproblems
@mb_inthehutt Revised date 16 September
@JoelRowan I'll rent it. Can pay $450 a week in rent. Willing to pay bond and 4 weeks rent in advance. Quiet young professionals as tenants
Mum: Wednesday is raining! Dad: F*CK OFF! I have a course to go on. Us: A golf course...? Him: EXACTLY
Humanity is an ever balanced scale of kindness and disgrace https://t.co/oi0X12NBCK
Can't decide if $42 on lipstick is a good idea or not. On the one hand it's a lot of money, on the other it's pretty #help #poorlifechoices
Currently hearing bass and cheers from town centre. Even Featherston, population 2253, has a more raging social scene than my own life
@liamkernaghan @laurenjwallis I ate two whole packets of shrewsberrys last weekend at @rainermac and @_abbey_'s house.
Dude in dominos goes: little hoodlums that's nuts. Me: classic Upper Hutt! Him: is that normal?!
Omg some little kids just had a brawl outside UH dominos. Wild.
Just overheard head conductor: "I love my job, I love my job, I love..."
Also hot af thanks to no air con.
Generator on train is broken. Have to get off at UH cos it's "dangerous" to go thru tunnel without lights #traintweets
@rainermac I just thought about "poop soup" and now I can't stop laughing cc @_abbey_
@_abbey_ I BLOODY CALLED IT. I TOLD RAINER THERE WAS NO WAY A WEDDING DRESS WAS FITTING IN THAT BOX.
@mb_inthehutt don't use "work" and "cake" in the same sentence if I don't get any
@mb_inthehutt why are we having cake?
When all of your work is in that stage where you just have to wait for things to happen and you're just SO DAMN BORED
Current mood: https://t.co/P2L9YJvc3b
LOOKING FOR 2BED FLAT IN WGTN: willing to Rumplestiltskon this shit and offer up my first born child in payment
@joshuasmith1234 please never bet on me ðŸ™
@rainermac and I are going to start using the work gym. Any work friends feel free to join our shambles of a workout crew
@GR_PowerGordon sounds like a decent song. Unfortunately 7yo's version consists of "ONE WAY, JESUS" followed by unintelligible shrieking
@GR_PowerGordon questionable label for the shrieking 7yo
In an unprecedented turn of events, the 7yo is now loudly singing "One Way, Jesus" in the other room
Semi regular reminder from me to you: be kind to people, see good in the world, and know that I love you #positivityforthesakeofpositivity
Me to 7yo: U can't use the tablet, you'll have to wait for it to charge 7yo shrieking like a demon: I CAN'T WAIT Me: *grabs bible*
Dog whines Mum: Yes we will in a minute Dog whines again Mum: yes I know, I'm just watching the weather
Dad covers the dogs ears to ask Mum if they should go walkies.
Still haven't found a house but I bought new lipstick today so I've got one thing going for me #ultramatte
My step mum on strawberries: mmm natures candy
Emotionally wrecked by #TheWestWing
@rainermac @NZPhotomac @WgtnPhoenixFC @ALeague thank you for this stunning photography
@mb_inthehutt nope? Have applied for heaps of places but no luck getting any
Flat hunting got me ready to live in my car in the car park at work. Except I backed my car into a lamppost today so yeah...
@_abbey_ I'm gonna get tee shirts printed
3 more flat viewings today. At this point I'd be happy to be offered the single room Anne Frank and her family lived in
I've done some stupid shit in my time but seriously I think I'm just taking the piss now https://t.co/HePC2r1odV
Went to an open flat today. Decided not to go for it before I got in the house. I think the exact moment was on step no.78 #halfwayup
@rainermac the being sick is making me more stressed
@rainermac creep
I'm so tired and stressed someone pls shower me with materialistic gifts and hugs and attention to make me feel better x
Great lunch at KFC with @rainermac #workingfornz #kfc cc @GR_PowerGordon
@mb_inthehutt I count 6 uses of the word organisational. C- for originality and variation.
Concept: me but without this awful swollen sore throat
@laurenjwallis @_abbey_ 5) failed at throwing me a towel 6) He made fun of my intern cc @joshuasmith1234
I'm tired and getting sick and over it someone pls buy me some ColourPop Ultra Matte Lipsticks to make me feel better
@mb_inthehutt @cjsbishop what's byo?
Obama is the Dad we all need https://t.co/A1sux2WaLY
@_abbey_ Classic Rainer
@rainermac @edufk @DearMama_ I'm not crying you're crying
#TheWestWing Season 7 Episode 8 omg I adore this show
@cjsbishop thank god there was never a job interview before you hired me. CC @mb_inthehutt @JoelRowan
I'm that scene in #Miranda where she sings The Greatest Love Of All at a job interview
Friendship is storing shitty vodka cruisers for the next visit. Thanks @rainermac @_abbey_ https://t.co/PXeulVSvO3
Can confirm this was both drab and miserable https://t.co/hv7BrS3Jzw
@mb_inthehutt @JoelRowan terrible influences on the sweet, innocent office child
@rainermac @jgmccl it's just something about their paws - it creeps me out
@rainermac @jgmccl most accurate description of me I've ever heard
Flat hunting is so bloody stressful. Gonna move into the basement at work.
It's as easy as riding a bike my ass. Just rode a bike for the first time in 5 years and crashed into a fence.
@mb_inthehutt do I count with Mississippis?
Tried to fake tan two hours ago. Literally nothing has happened. My pasty AF skin has no chance
Babysitting. Kids in the other room. Haven't heard either one speak for 25 minutes. V suspicious.
@rainermac you definitely imagined it
@mb_inthehutt crush the patriarchy
@mb_inthehutt it's the pale skin isn't it
@mb_inthehutt the comparison has been made...
This is Monty. He likes vodka and isn't very good at tug-of-war. https://t.co/CgnJW5nQiX
This is Bo who frequents the cat tunnel. The other cat in the clip of called Possum. https://t.co/MIwWlP5xHY
Family friends have a cat tunnel from their house to a play pen outside. A freaking cat tunnel!! #cattunnel https://t.co/z9XtUoIzio
Dad putting together his new chair Dad: Uh Oh Me: ? Dad: we're missing something Me:? Dad: someone qualified to put this together
Mufasa's death is the single most traumatic thing to happen to me. #lionking #tv2
I've eaten so much today I think I might be sick. Mum: do you want some food Me: yes
@_abbey_ you guys are the dream children (in law)
@cjsbishop fitting re recent discussions on The War On Christmas
"There was more than one lobster present at the birth of Jesus?" #iconic
Time for the compulsory Christmas Eve viewing of Love Actually
@_abbey_ @rainermac I thought we were friends and then I learn this
She left me standing holding the milkshake while she went and looked in a shop with a 'no food' policy.
Mum: do u want a sip of my milkshake? Me: mmmm not really Mum: no try it *shoves milkshake at me* I take it and she immediately walks away
Man, Sister Act II is a great movie #sistermaryclarence #tv2
When you're the only one on your floor at work and you don't have a key to your office #crosswordtime
@joshuasmith1234 Thanks <3
Upset about all of these MPs resigning/ not contesting. I've been learning all their names using flashcards for no reason #wastehertime2016
Baked over 100 Christmas Cookies today. If I see one more smushed star shape I think I will spontaneously combust.
@_abbey_ this is the funniest thing
@iadambutchart @NewshubPolitics @NewshubNZ Still don't see where you're going with this argument
